input.sentences: i started my new job at a coffee shop .
the manager showed me what to do .
we shook hands and i started work right away .
after my shift | i sat down to a cup of coffee .
output.sentences: I had just started my shopping when I saw a sign at my favorite shop for a job.
I talked to a manager while I made my purchase.
He started telling me what was expected, and we shook hands when he offered me the job.
It's a unique shop that sells mugs, and exotic coffee.
I felt happy as I arranged the shift I would work, while I sat down with a cup on the house.
